page.title: 17HOME LIFE, SAUNDERSFOOT
page.content: {A day in my life by Bryan White} I woke at about 7.15.a.m. and got dressed.I was so excited as it was my birthday.I went into mum's room and asked if I could open my presents. She took a box from under her bed.I opened it and the card said it was from Mum, Dad,Katy,Sarah and Steven.Inside was a camera with a film.Then Dad came up with the tea and another present.It was from Aunty Jane,Uncle Jim, Emily and Tom.It was a jigsaw.I went down stairs for a breakfast of cornflakes, toast and jam.After breakfast I went for the papers carrying a present for Nanna.When I went there she said that it was mine.I opened it and there was a camera case and a film I went back home and got ready for school.When I got there about 9.10 I played soft ball until 9.30.and then got down to work in class.
